definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Florals are for middle-aged women with weight problems.
sentences.chinese: 大花圖案都是爲那些有體重問題的中年婦女所準備的。

sentences.english: Middle-aged , he has never married and has a lecherous side.
sentences.chinese: 他雖已中年，但尚末娶妻，特別好色。

sentences.english: Liu is a more than 40-year-old middle-aged women.
sentences.chinese: 劉文是一位40多歲的中年婦女。

sentences.english: Past mid-life, one learns little and expects little.
sentences.chinese: 一過中年，學習得少，期望也少。

sentences.english: This in turn blighted his middle years.
sentences.chinese: 這最終使他在中年鬱郁不得志。

sentences.english: The middle-aged man suddenly patted his head, Liu halal is hate see late.
sentences.chinese: 那中年人猛然拍拍腦袋，對劉清真是相恨見晚。

sentences.english: She told the story of a middle-aged Chengdu woman whose only child is in university.
sentences.chinese: 霍沃德講了一個成都中年婦女的故事。

sentences.english: Content Analysis Study on Character Education in Textbooks of Learning Area of Integrated …
sentences.chinese: 臺灣國民小學中年級綜合活動領域教科書融入品德。

sentences.english: " She gestured to a middle-aged couple holding hands. "Look at them.
sentences.chinese: 她指着一對手牽手的中年夫婦，“看看他們。
空間革命的中年粘彈性泡沫枕頭。

sentences.english: In between - all 23 years - is your middle age。
sentences.chinese: 而這之間的23年則是人的中年時期。

sentences.english: News of this middle-aged man's sudden passing nearly broke the Web.
sentences.chinese: 這個中年男人的突然離去讓整個網絡世界炸開了鍋。

sentences.english: Today, she says, the middle-aged of the middle class can take that path too.
sentences.chinese: 而當代的中年階層在這方面不遑多讓。

sentences.english: What do the middleaged women need in order to maintain their youth and doomed decrepitude ?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是中年婦女的需要，以維持其青年和註定衰老？

sentences.english: Since then, I had grown from a fatherless child into a middle-aged man.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後，我已從一個無父的孩子長成一位中年人。

sentences.english: During the Chin dynasty of the fourth century, there was a middle-aged man in Shanyin called Kung Yu.
sentences.chinese: 在公元四世紀的秦朝，山陰縣有個名叫孔玉的中年人。

definition: lit. robust years/prime of life/summer/able-bodied (fit for military service)/mature (talent, garden etc)
without doubt/with full self-confidence/forty years of age
to be in the prime of life
to be successful in business/professional success
